subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The freshman Grayson Allen scored a season-best 27 points, and No. 3 Duke routed Wake Forest, 94-51, for its 10th straight win.
snippet: The freshman Grayson Allen scored a season-best 27 points, and No. 3 Duke routed Wake Forest, 94-51, for its 10th straight win.
